Name: The Waterflame Brothers
About the game: Explore a world where the stories you know aren't what you've been told. A fantastic adventure with 3D platform mechanics, live an exciting adventure created specifically for two people. Play split-screen and take on ever-changing challenges that can only be won with co-op! - History In a magical world full of mysteries, there was a castle, which was the home of the Waterflame family, a family of wizards composed of a mother, her two children and a pet frog. After an accident with some potions, the children are transformed into elemental monsters and need to work together to get back to being a child. - Characters In the game you will be able to choose between the two children, Serena Waterflame and Aidan Waterflame, each one will represent an element and this will directly impact the interactions and mechanics of the characters. - Main Features Local and online cooperation Complement each other's strengths with your skills Adorable characters Explore fun and unique environments - About The Developer Game developed by Iago Souza, student of digital games at FUMEC University, as a final course work; Credits to Professor Lucas (voice of the narrator)
